name: Good Robot! :)
description:
Good Robot! :) is a game about cooperating with your robot friend to solve a set of puzzles set in a glowy technological environment! will you be able to save billy bob the third?

This is my first game jam AND my first unity game! 

Controls:

MOVEMENTWASDJUMPSPACEGRAB BOX - PLAYER
E
GRAB BOX - ROBOT 
SHIFTRESTARTR
